scripts.migrateUser: npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name user --attributes id:UUID,deleted:boolean,deleted_at:Date,name:string,role:string,lastName:string,email:string,password:string,zip:string,neighborhood:string,street:string,streetNumber:string,streetComplement:string,city:string,state:string --force && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
scripts.migrateProduct: npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name product --attributes id:UUID,name:string,price:float,available:boolean,category:string,image:string,weight:float,height:float,width:float,material:string,description:string --force && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
scripts.migrateOrder: npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name order --attributes id:UUID,status:string,userId:string,productIds:array,shippingInfo:string,paymentInfo:string,additionalNotes:string --force && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
